attributes.action: save our leafy lane - elmdon lane, marston green birmingham adjacent to Birmingham International Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE HELP 



SAVE OUR LEAFY LANE







Re: Land Rear of 110-134 Elmdon Lane Marston Green, Birmingham

Application No. 2007/1713  Ref: Lawrence Osborne


BUIDING 70 HOUSES AND ACCESS  ON LAND WHICH IS CURRENTLY  GARDENS 



 

DO NOT LET THE COUNCIL DESTROY OUR WAY OF LIFE, 

OUR BEAUTIFUL LEAFY LANE, 

OUR ENGLISH STYLE.  WE DO NOT WANT TO BECOME 

JUST ANOTHER SPRAWLING CONCRETE SUBURB.

 

LEAVE OUR LANE ALONE



DO NOT LET THE COUNCIL COMPROMISE SECURITY AT BIRMINGHAM INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT.........

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save our leafy lane - elmdon lane, marston green birmingham adjacent to Birmingham International Airport."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16996


Prime Minister's Office
